executionDetails: Updated prompt to delegate type selection to script; added interactive menu (curses) in rdd.py with hidden Enhancement option; preserved param-based execution; verified version run; created P01-implementation.md with details.

Implemented configurable default branch with local configuration file. Created config.json template in .rdd/templates/, added config helper functions to rdd_utils.py, updated get_default_branch() to read from config, created interactive branch selection menu, updated init_rdd_docs() to prompt user and populate config, added config domain commands (show/get/set), updated routing and help system. Configuration file placed in .rdd-docs/config.json as specified. User can now configure default branch via interactive menu (options: main, dev, custom) during initialization or via CLI commands.
